title: Disney Boys' Little Winter Hat and Kids Gloves Set, The Incredible 2 Beanie for Ages 4-7
features: HIGH QUALITY MATERIAL: Soft and comfortable fleece Materials, naturally Warm. The toddler Beanie Hat and Gloves / Mittens are all double layered with soft and fuzzy Sherpa lining for comfort and extra warmth. Outside: 100% Acrylic. Lining: Soft Sherpa Lining.

ADORABLE DESIGN: Matching Incredible pattern Winter Hat and Kids Glove / Mitten set with thick earflaps, and features Incredible patch embroidered on the front. Matching Red Toddler Gloves / Mittens with a Black cuff features an Incredible gripper print design, Great coverage for Head, Ears and their little cute Hands.

FUN AND FASHIONABLE: Featuring colorful Incredible imagery from Disney, this cute and comfy cold-weather baby beanie accessory set is all your little Incredible fan will want to wear all winter. With Incredible at their side to keep their hands warm, they’ll be ready for fun and adventure on even the snowiest of days.
CARE INSTRUCTIONS: Hand wash cold with like color, only non-chlorine bleach when needed, lay flat to dry, do not iron. LICENSED PRODUCT: Officially licensed Disney Incredible product.

UNIQUE GIFTS: Multiple choices of Designs and Sizes these adorable toddler Winter Hat and toddler Mittens / Gloves set is the ultimate Gift for any holidays and birthday occasion, and will be the Winter Hat and Snow Gloves they’ll always wear.
